title: Bug 15023"Select Working Set" doesn't?
description: WindowSelect Working Set.Create a working set and select it. OK.The navigator still shows all projects.On a related note, the java browsing views now let you select working setsindividually for each view. If this is the way it will work, then it's confusingto have "Select Working Set" in the main Window menu if it doesn't do anythingin any of the views.
